tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited for Knee Replacement

I totally Recommend the Doctor

My Mother was having severe pain in her both knees from last 10 years and now it was very difficult for her to take 2-3 steps. We visited Dr. Amite Pankaj Ji at Fortis on 12th December, 2023 and he explained the problem in detail and suggested for Total Knee Replacement . We were very tensed related to knee replacement but Dr Amite and his team explained in a very good manner that it will be a 2-3 hours process and patient will take start recovering within 2-3 days. She was hospitalized for 5 days and now I can see smile on face of my Mother on day of discharge.
Post Surgery also Dr. Amite meet on daily basis for 4 days to my Mother and assured her that she will get perfect soon.
Ms. Vandana , team member of Dr. Amite also helped us in various ways and she was available on one call.
Mr Akshay Singhal, Physiotherapist helped my mother a lot and also motivated her that she can take steps and walk. Physiotherapist team including all girls member was very cooperative.
Ms. Geetanjali, Night Shift Nurse taken a good care of My mother.
Satisfied with Dr Amite Sir and his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother had a severe problem of pain in the knee joint and she couldn‚Äôt even walk freely,it had been more than 20 years that she was struggling for doing her day to day routine, so we decided to consult Dr.Amite Pankaj Aggarwal 
and he explained us the problem just by seeing my mother...he suggested us to go for the surgery as soon as possible..he explained every thing about the surgery in prior and told us that this would be a fast track operation and the patient will start recovering in two to three days...the bilateral knee surgery went well and I could see a smile of relief on my mums face after the operation....as an attendant to my mother I could see the dedication and patience of the team of Dr.Amite Pankaj...
Miss vandana and mr Dilip made it easy for us to take care of the Tpa process 
And Dr. Pankaj Aggarwal who was present at the time of surgery was very helpful too..
The post surgery process like the physiotherapy sessions went well with the help of Dr.Deepti At the hospital and Dr.harinder and  Dr.Neeraj at the clinic
Our good wishes to Dr.Amite Pankaj and his team may god give them a long and healthy life so that they can serve the needful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
** ******* ***** **** ** ***** ****** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ******** *** ***** **** ************ He had performed Total Knee Replacement procedure  of both knees of my wife on 14 Oct at Fortis Shalimar Bagh. She was made to stand within two hours of surgery and made to walk next day. Its five days hospitalisation. There were no external stitches and bandages were removed after two weeks. My wife was of her own after eight days of surgery. She left using walker/stick after four weeks and is recovering fast. It is painless surgery and also there is no pain afterwards if one follows doctor's instructions. Dr Amite has dedicated team of doctors, physiotherapists and coordinators. Dr Amite himself was only a call away during hospitalisation of my wife. I must add that Dr Amite follows strict timings, talks straight and leaves no room for confusion for patient or attendant. I sincerely thank Dr Amite Pankaj Agarwal and recommend to patients looking for total or partial knee replacement.
Joginder Jyoti***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ** *** ***** I was amazed how he managed so many degrees with expereince in his field. I have been consulting him for more than 5yrs and now my entire family and friends are going to him. He has extensive experience and the best part is his advice is always in the best concern of partient. For my case when all the doctors suggested surgery he was the one who said to wait and try physio first and it simply worked for me. Today I cant thank him enough for his honest advice and not being moeny driven like these days doctors have been. *** ******** *** ********** *** **** *** will recommend it to everyone. ** ** *** **** ** ***** ***** Thanks sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr.  Amite for my mom corresponding to Knee Replacement way back last year in month of August. He asked us to get the TKR surgery done and result would be positive. And with God grace and Dr. Amite experience surgery got successful and now my mom is able to walk without any hiccup. People who think TKR surgery is painful and is not successful, would suggest please change your thoughts on the same and consult Dr. Amite. He is very helpful and nice to his patients and take cares of them till they do not feel satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Amazing Doctor. Smiling face, encouraging words and many doubts cleared within minutes.
Was talking pain killer for last 3 years. After meeting Dr. Amite Pankaj Aggarwal, took decision, enough is enough, as advised,  to go for Total Knee Replacement.
Operated on 2nd March, 2019 ( both knees), started moving with walker on 4th March and discharged on 7th March. Still surprised,how can such major operation so painless?
I am thankful to God for guiding  me to get in touch with efficient Dr. Pankaj Aggarwal. He really has a magic hand.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ***** ****** ** *** **** ***** ******* **** *** *** ******* **** **** ** ***** ** **** *********** ******** I took my mother to him for a Right KR and his words were of immense help for us to make our mind in decision making to go ahead with the procedure. Once decided, everything moved seamlessly,right from the time of admission to the hospital, ********* ******** and no unexpected post-surgical issues. Kudos to him and his bright and intelligent team. 
I would recommend all those who are planning for TKR for themselves, elders or other family members, pls do visit Dr. Amite******* **** *** *** ****** **** ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We even  being  educated  were sceptical about the surgery. It was only  after  meeting  Dr. Amit we  made  up  our mind.It was  the  right  advice and motivation  given by  him  only. Now we  have  realized that we would have decided earlier and avoided the sufferings.My wife was  in real bad  shape  before  we  reached  here  but  now it appears  there  will be  great  change  in the  quality of life. I  have  found a real angel in Dr. Amit. I have  never  come  across  such a caring and loving team of doctors in my life. Although I  have  tought  Dr. Amit  for  a short  period  now I  am  highly proud  that my  saplingling which I planted long  back are blossoming and serving the humanity. I wish that  they  grow  further and serve  the people. God bless you all. Thank Amit,Tarun and the  team.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My mother suffered fracture in her femur bone and required hospitalization and surgery. She is an extremely underweight senior person and I was worried about whether she will be able to tolerate undergoing a difficult surgery. I entrusted her in the hands of Dr. Amite Pankaj Aggarwal at Fortis Shalimar Bagh and he did a great job! Not only he performed surgery successfully but also managed post-operative care very well. She is recovering fine. As a bonus, his attitude is superlative. He comforted my panicked mother very well and that helped her recovery, psychologically.
 
Thank you doctor. Stay great!

review:
Pathetic experience. I travelled 2 hours one side and waited 30 minutes at the clinic for my appointment. The doctor did not even see the problem area, he just wrote me a prescription in 3 minutes without seeing the impact of my injury and suggested MRI straight without even asking me for any movement.
Will not go again my ever.

tags: None
review: Dr. Amite Pankaj Aggarwal is very nice person *** *** **** ******* I was very impressed with his straight forward consulting and diagnosis. His team was excellent. He spent sufficient time to attend me, patiently listened and answered all my questions. He also explained me my medical conditions in detail. First I was very scared for my ACL surgery bt after the meeting with Dr. Amite Pankaj my all fear was vanished & I was totally prepared for the surgery. His phsio team is also vry excellent & helpful specially Dr. Neeraj ( phsio) is very trained & humble. Dr.Amite Pankaj is really a GEM in orthopaedic. God bless him & his team

He really treated us like we are his family.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr Aggarwal at fortis for knee replacement surgery . During our 5 days visit ,Dr Aggarwal and his team exhibited thorough professional attitude befitting to our expectations. I shall be writing another review based on post treatment assistance.    Kudos to team and best of luck

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am very happy with solution and explanation of my health problem by the doctor. He realised my 25 years old knee joint issue and helped me. Whenever I went to his clinic he cooperated with me nicely and also provided me with the best care and physiotherapy. He also suggested me the best value   treatment for spine joint. I highly recommend the doctor for others also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor gave less than a minute to the patient (lower back pain). He recommended x-ray and MRI as soon as we told him that the patient has back ache - without checking *********** even after the x-ray& MRI was done, the doctor did not even look at the films *** **** *** * ****** ** *** ******* even after that he did not check ********** and **** prescribed medicine. can not recommend this doctor for sure.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: We were recommended to meet Dr. Agarwal by a friend and we came for a second opinion. He heard the issue patiently and explained the cause, treatment options in detail. He answered all our queries and urged us to discuss without hurrying. My husband and I were very relieved and satisfied with his explanation. I would surely recommend him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Overall, a very satisfy experience. My mom underwent knee replacement for both the knees. Though she so long to make up her mind but finally after meeting Dr Amite and few of her patients treated in the past, she gained confidence and got it done. Kudos to his team dedication

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

reply_text: If there was no Orthopedic problem, we are sure your fees could have been refunded had you so desired. Please feel free to visit.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Before meeting Dr. Amite I was not sure about my knee surgery, but he made me overcome all my fears, explained the whole procedure, which made me gain confidence and I decided to get my knees replaced. My surgery was successful due to expertise of Dr. Amite and my post operative care by his team of great doctors and physiotherapists was very good. I am recovering fast, walking on my own and soon would be able to resume my independent life, all due to Dr. Amite. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have been looking for a surgeon for knee replacement but could not gain confidence. Met Dr (Prof) Amite Pankaj Aggarwal and immediately narrowed down my search on him. Young, energetic, knowledgeable, expert in his field. Friendly behavior makes you feel easy. Treatment standard is superb. Wish him great success in his career ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My father had come for B/L TKR for his OA knees,mild to mod in lt knee and mod to severe in Rt knee.Dr Amit convinced him very wisely that  by undergoing only Rt knee Replacement his problems will be solved.so my dad has undergone rt Tkr only and is happy with it.
I am thankful that my dad did not have to undergo B/L surgery unnecessarily.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Had undergone knee surgery from dr. amite one year back *** ***** ***** *** **** ********* ** ***** I was undergoing immense pain and when after one year I went through CT scan, it was found that none of the bones have been joined and even the plate has found broken inside. And again same process as i had suffered a year back will take place again.

Moreover, even after such conditions doctor is not ready to take the case saying that it is not a major issue.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was good experience ,  great team with positive attitude and behavior , my mother was suffering  since last 15years for joint problem but after knee replacement  surgery on the next day she was able to walk calmly and very much happy with the operation,  thanks to god and doctor team of Fortis

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My son was diagnosed with septic arithritis left hip which eventually started with the pain in the left leg and high fever. He was not able to bear weight on the lower left limb.As soon as he was admitted at the Fortis Shalimar Bagh  A series of test we‚Äôre conducted including ultrasound abdomen ;pelvis X Ray both hip joints ;MRI ..
These tests revealed about septic arithritis left hip and so left hip arthrotomy and drainage was done on an urgent basis by Dr Amite Pankaj Aggarwal and his team . Each and every consequence was explained prior the surgery . The Doctor was very co operative and kind to us ..Whenever we needed his  support and guidance during the treatment he was always available.. So with all the efforts of the Dr my son is fully fit and fine now .. All thanks to him üôèüôè
